languages.text: "Что ж... Я не первый год в Просторе. Не первый год веду дела. За это время по ту сторону стола переговоров не раз восседали не охотники на трофеи или контрабандисты, а {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} — достаточно разумные, чтобы считать общую выгоду лучшим исходом встречи, нежели взаимное уничтожение. Я знаю, что по этому поводу говорит {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g}. Но сказать от чистого сердца — я знаю, где проходит граница между обычной сделкой и предательством Человечества. И я ее не пересекаю".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж... Я не первый год в Коронусе. Не первый год веду дела. За это время по ту сторону стола переговоров не раз восседали не охотники на трофеи или контрабандисты, а ксеносы — достаточно разумные, чтобы считать общую выгоду лучшим исходом встречи, нежели взаимное уничтожение. Я знаю, что по этому поводу говорит Экклезиархия. Но сказать от чистого сердца — я знаю, где проходит граница между обычной сделкой и предательством Человечества. И я ее не пересекаю".

languages.text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."
languages.original_text: "Что ж... Я не первый год в Просторе. Не первый год веду дела. За это время по ту сторону стола переговоров не раз восседали не охотники на трофеи или контрабандисты, а {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} — достаточно разумные, чтобы считать общую выгоду лучшим исходом встречи, нежели взаимное уничтожение. Я знаю, что по этому поводу говорит {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g}. Но сказать от чистого сердца — я знаю, где проходит граница между обычной сделкой и предательством Человечества. И я ее не пересекаю".

traits.locale_text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in Koronus. Not my first year in business. During this time, on numerous occasions, I've sat at the negotiating table with — no, not with loot hunters or smugglers — with xenos, ones who were intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the Ecclesiarchy says about it. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know the line between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of humanity. And I never cross it."

"All right, then... This isn't my first year in Koronus. Not my first year in business. During this time, on numerous occasions, I've sat at the negotiating table with — no, not with loot hunters or smugglers — with xenos, ones who were intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the Ecclesiarchy says about it. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know the line between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of humanity. And I never cross it."

"All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Koronus. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with xenos, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the Ecclesiarchy has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

"All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Koronus. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with xenos, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the Ecclesiarchy has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

"All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

languages.text: “好吧，嗯……我已经来科罗努斯扩区一段时间了，这也并不是我第一次做生意。我曾和各种各样的人坐在谈判桌前，并不只有战利品猎人与走私犯，还有{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。那些异形非常聪明，足以理解我们会面最好的结果是互惠互利，而不是彼此毁灭。我很清楚{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}对这种行为有什么看法，但我发自内心地想说，我很清楚与异形贸易和背叛人类之间的界限在哪里，而且我从来不会越界。”
languages.original_text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，嗯……我已经来科罗努斯扩区一段时间了，这也并不是我第一次做生意。我曾和各种各样的人坐在谈判桌前，并不只有战利品猎人与走私犯，还有{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}。那些异形非常聪明，足以理解我们会面最好的结果是互惠互利，而不是彼此毁灭。我很清楚{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}对这种行为有什么看法，但我发自内心地想说，我很清楚与异形贸易和背叛人类之间的界限在哪里，而且我从来不会越界。”

languages.text: «De acuerdo... No es mi primer año en la Extensión ni en este mercado. Me he sentado a negociar con todo tipo de gente, no solo saqueadores y contrabandistas, también con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} lo suficientemente inteligentes para comprender que el beneficio mutuo era mejor para ambos que destruirnos. Ya sé lo que opina la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} al respecto, pero, desde lo más profundo de mi corazón, sé cuál es la línea que separa un acuerdo convencional de la traición a la Humanidad. Y no la cruzo nunca».
languages.original_text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo... No es mi primer año en la Extensión ni en este mercado. Me he sentado a negociar con todo tipo de gente, no solo saqueadores y contrabandistas, también con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} lo suficientemente inteligentes para comprender que el beneficio mutuo era mejor para ambos que destruirnos. Ya sé lo que opina la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} al respecto, pero, desde lo más profundo de mi corazón, sé cuál es la línea que separa un acuerdo convencional de la traición a la Humanidad. Y no la cruzo nunca».

languages.text: 「了解…これがエクスパンスに来た初めての年ではないし、ビジネスを始めたのも初めての年じゃない。色んな種類の人間と交渉の席についてきたよ…戦利品ハンターや密輸業者だけじゃなくて、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}もそうさ。異種族は十分に頭が良くて、話し合った結果、殺し合うより利益を分かち合う方が良いと信じてもらえるほどだった。このことに{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}が何と言っているかは知っているよ。でも心の底から言って、普通の取引と人類への裏切りの境界線は分かってる。アタシは絶対にそれを越えたりしない」
languages.original_text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

traits.locale_text: 「了解…これがエクスパンスに来た初めての年ではないし、ビジネスを始めたのも初めての年じゃない。色んな種類の人間と交渉の席についてきたよ…戦利品ハンターや密輸業者だけじゃなくて、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}もそうさ。異種族は十分に頭が良くて、話し合った結果、殺し合うより利益を分かち合う方が良いと信じてもらえるほどだった。このことに{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}が何と言っているかは知っているよ。でも心の底から言って、普通の取引と人類への裏切りの境界線は分かってる。アタシは絶対にそれを越えたりしない」

languages.text: "Also gut ... dies ist nicht mein erstes Jahr in der Ausdehnung. Und es ist auch nicht mein erstes Jahr im Geschäft. Ich saß schon mit fast allen am Verhandlungstisch – nicht nur mit Plünderern oder Schmugglern, sondern auch mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die intelligent genug waren, um zu erkennen, dass beidseitige Vorteile ein besseres Gesprächsergebnis sind als gegenseitige Vernichtung. Und ich weiß, was die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} dazu sagt. Aber aus tiefstem Herzen gesprochen, ich weiß auch, wo die Linie zwischen einem normalen Geschäft und einem Verrat an der Menschheit verläuft. Und die würde ich niemals überschreiten."
languages.original_text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

traits.locale_text: "Also gut ... dies ist nicht mein erstes Jahr in der Ausdehnung. Und es ist auch nicht mein erstes Jahr im Geschäft. Ich saß schon mit fast allen am Verhandlungstisch – nicht nur mit Plünderern oder Schmugglern, sondern auch mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die intelligent genug waren, um zu erkennen, dass beidseitige Vorteile ein besseres Gesprächsergebnis sind als gegenseitige Vernichtung. Und ich weiß, was die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} dazu sagt. Aber aus tiefstem Herzen gesprochen, ich weiß auch, wo die Linie zwischen einem normalen Geschäft und einem Verrat an der Menschheit verläuft. Und die würde ich niemals überschreiten."

languages.text: « Bon, très bien... Ce n'est pas ma première année dans les Étendues de Koronus, et je ne débute pas dans les affaires non plus. J'ai négocié avec toutes sortes de gens, et pas seulement des pillards ou des contrebandiers, mais aussi des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, ceux assez intelligents pour comprendre qu'il vaut mieux qu'une rencontre aboutisse à un bénéfice commun, plutôt qu'à une destruction mutuelle. Je connais la position de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} sur la question. Mais je vous le dis du fond du cœur : je sais faire la différence entre un accord comme un autre et la trahison de l'humanité. C'est la limite que je ne franchis jamais. »
languages.original_text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

traits.locale_text: « Bon, très bien... Ce n'est pas ma première année dans les Étendues de Koronus, et je ne débute pas dans les affaires non plus. J'ai négocié avec toutes sortes de gens, et pas seulement des pillards ou des contrebandiers, mais aussi des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, ceux assez intelligents pour comprendre qu'il vaut mieux qu'une rencontre aboutisse à un bénéfice commun, plutôt qu'à une destruction mutuelle. Je connais la position de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} sur la question. Mais je vous le dis du fond du cœur : je sais faire la différence entre un accord comme un autre et la trahison de l'humanité. C'est la limite que je ne franchis jamais. »

languages.text: "Pekâlâ... Enginlik'te yeni değilim, keza bu işte de öyle. Her türden insanla müzakere masasına oturmuşluğum var. Sadece ganimet avcıları veya kaçakçılarla da değil, günün sonunda karşılıklı yararın karşılıklı yıkımdan daha iyi olduğuna inanacak kadar zeki {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolarla{/g} da. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi'nin{/g} bu konudaki hükmünü biliyorum. Tüm kalbimle şunu söylemek isterim: Sıradan bir anlaşma ile İnsanlığa ihanet arasındaki çizginin gayet farkındayım, o çizgiyi asla aşmam."
languages.original_text: "All right, then... This isn't my first year in the Expanse. It's not my first year in business either. I've sat at the negotiating table with all sorts — not just loot hunters or smugglers either, but with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ones intelligent enough to believe that mutual benefit was a better outcome of our meeting than mutual destruction. I know what the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has to say about that. But, speaking from the bottom of my heart — I know where the line is between an ordinary deal and a betrayal of Humanity. And I never cross it."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ, o zaman... Enginlik'te yeni değilim, keza bu işte de öyle. Müzakere masasında her türden insanla oturdum. Sadece ganimet avcıları veya kaçakçılar da değil, karşılıklı yararın karşılıklı yıkımdan daha iyi bir sonuç olduğuna inanacak kadar zeki {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g} da vardı aralarında. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g}'nin bu konudaki hükmünü biliyorum ama tüm kalbimle şunu söylemek isterim: Sıradan bir anlaşma ile İnsanlığa ihanet arasındaki çizginin nerede olduğunu biliyorum ve o çizgiyi asla aşmam."
